fr.xephi.authme.api

Class NewAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.xephi.authme.api.NewAPI
  • Deprecated. 
    Will be removed in 5.5! Use AuthMeApi instead.

    @Deprecated
public class NewAPI
extends Object
    The v2 API of AuthMe. Recommended method of retrieving the API object: NewAPI authmeApi = NewAPI.getInstance();
